caption.title: Difference in dominant polyadenylation sites (PAS) between species likely drives differences in expression.
caption.p: ( a) Enrichment of genes with the different (left) of same (right) dominant PAS by dominant cutoff in differentially expressed genes. ( b) −log 10 (p-values) for enrichments in (a) calculated with hypergeometric tests. Horizontal line represents a p-value of 0.05. The bars are colored by the dominance cutoff on the X axis.

caption.title: Figure 4 without genes affected by liftover.
caption.p: ( A) Enrichment of genes with the different (left) or same (right) dominant polyadenylation sites (PAS) by dominant cutoff in differentially expressed genes after removing genes likely affected by liftover. ( B) -log 10 (p-values) for enrichments in (A) calculated with hypergeometric tests. Horizontal line represents p=0.05.
